trans-unit.source: About virtual machine extensions and features | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: About virtual machine extensions and features | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes many of the virtual machine extensions, grouped by what they provide or improve, such as connectivity and basic management.
trans-unit.target: Describes many of the virtual machine extensions, grouped by what they provide or improve, such as connectivity and basic management.

trans-unit.source: About virtual machine extensions and features
trans-unit.target: About virtual machine extensions and features

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure provides VM Extensions built by both Microsoft and by trusted third-party providers to enable security, runtime, debugging, management, and other features you can take advantage of to increase your productivity with Azure Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure provides VM Extensions built by both Microsoft and by trusted third-party providers to enable security, runtime, debugging, management, and other features you can take advantage of to increase your productivity with Azure Virtual Machines.

trans-unit.source: This topic describes the various features that Azure VM Extensions provide to both Windows and Linux Virtual Machines for your use and points toward documentation for each one.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes the various features that Azure VM Extensions provide to both Windows and Linux Virtual Machines for your use and points toward documentation for each one.

trans-unit.source: For details about the VM Agents and how they work to support VM Extensions, see <link><linkText>VM Agent and VM Extensions Overview</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For details about the VM Agents and how they work to support VM Extensions, see <link><linkText>VM Agent and VM Extensions Overview</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: VM Extensions implement most of the critical functionality that you want to use with your VMs, including basic functionality like resetting passwords, configuring RDP, and many, many others.
trans-unit.target: VM Extensions implement most of the critical functionality that you want to use with your VMs, including basic functionality like resetting passwords, configuring RDP, and many, many others.

trans-unit.source: Because new extensions are added all the time, the number of possible features your VMs support in Azure continues to increase.
trans-unit.target: Because new extensions are added all the time, the number of possible features your VMs support in Azure continues to increase.

trans-unit.source: By default, several basic VM extensions are installed when you create your VM from the Image Gallery, including IaaSDiagnostics (currently Windows VMs only), VMAccess, and BGInfo (also currently Windows only).
trans-unit.target: By default, several basic VM extensions are installed when you create your VM from the Image Gallery, including IaaSDiagnostics (currently Windows VMs only), VMAccess, and BGInfo (also currently Windows only).

trans-unit.source: However, not all extensions are implemented on both Windows and Linux at any specific time, due to the constant flow of feature updates and new extensions.
trans-unit.target: However, not all extensions are implemented on both Windows and Linux at any specific time, due to the constant flow of feature updates and new extensions.

trans-unit.source: The following extensions are critical to enabling, re-enabling, or disabling basic connectivity with your VMs once they are created and running.
trans-unit.target: The following extensions are critical to enabling, re-enabling, or disabling basic connectivity with your VMs once they are created and running.

trans-unit.source: Create, update, and reset user information and RDP and SSH connection configurations.
trans-unit.target: Create, update, and reset user information and RDP and SSH connection configurations.

trans-unit.source: Create, update, and reset user information and RDP and SSH connection configurations.
trans-unit.target: Create, update, and reset user information and RDP and SSH connection configurations.

trans-unit.source: The following extensions support different kinds of deployment and configuration management scenarios and features.
trans-unit.target: The following extensions support different kinds of deployment and configuration management scenarios and features.

trans-unit.source: See also the section on VM Operations and Management, below.
trans-unit.target: See also the section on VM Operations and Management, below.

trans-unit.source: Implements features for support by Windows System Center.
trans-unit.target: Implements features for support by Windows System Center.

trans-unit.source: Supports automated deployment of ASP.NET web applications and Windows Services into development, test, and production environments.
trans-unit.target: Supports automated deployment of ASP.NET web applications and Windows Services into development, test, and production environments.

trans-unit.source: Supports continuous deployment with Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Supports continuous deployment with Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Creates a Chef client on Windows.
trans-unit.target: Creates a Chef client on Windows.

trans-unit.source: (Can also use the DSC extension, below.)
trans-unit.target: (Can also use the DSC extension, below.)

trans-unit.source: Installs the Docker daemon to support remote Docker commands.
trans-unit.target: Installs the Docker daemon to support remote Docker commands.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>How to Use the Docker Virtual Machine Extension</linkText><title></title></link>For more extensive information, see the <link><linkText>Docker VM Extension User Guide</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>How to Use the Docker Virtual Machine Extension</linkText><title></title></link>For more extensive information, see the <link><linkText>Docker VM Extension User Guide</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Implements the features of Puppet Enterprise.
trans-unit.target: Implements the features of Puppet Enterprise.

trans-unit.source: Invokes custom scripts on the VM at any time: startup or during lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Invokes custom scripts on the VM at any time: startup or during lifetime.

trans-unit.source: Consumes the diagnostic data collected by IaaSDiagnostics and few other data sources such as Azure Storage Analytics Metrics and transforms it into an aggregated data set appropriate for SAP Host control process to consume
trans-unit.target: Consumes the diagnostic data collected by IaaSDiagnostics and few other data sources such as Azure Storage Analytics Metrics and transforms it into an aggregated data set appropriate for SAP Host control process to consume

trans-unit.source: The extensions in this section provide critical security features for your Azure VMs.
trans-unit.target: The extensions in this section provide critical security features for your Azure VMs.

trans-unit.source: Provides Microsoft Azure customers with the capability to encrypt their virtual machine data on a multi-tenant shared infrastructure and fully control of the encryption keys for their encrypted data on Azure storage infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Provides Microsoft Azure customers with the capability to encrypt their virtual machine data on a multi-tenant shared infrastructure and fully control of the encryption keys for their encrypted data on Azure storage infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Securing Microsoft Azure Virtual Machines leveraging BitLocker and Native OS encryption</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Securing Microsoft Azure Virtual Machines leveraging BitLocker and Native OS encryption</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Protects your VM against malicious software.
trans-unit.target: Protects your VM against malicious software.

trans-unit.source: Enables TrendMicro’s Deep Security platform support to provide intrusion detection and prevention, firewall, anti-malware, web reputation, log inspection, and integrity monitoring.
trans-unit.target: Enables TrendMicro’s Deep Security platform support to provide intrusion detection and prevention, firewall, anti-malware, web reputation, log inspection, and integrity monitoring.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>How to install and configure Trend Micro Deep Security as a Service on an Azure VM</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>How to install and configure Trend Micro Deep Security as a Service on an Azure VM</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Guards against threats to your Microsoft SharePoint environment.
trans-unit.target: Guards against threats to your Microsoft SharePoint environment.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Antimalware for Azure Cloud Services and Virtual Machines is a real-time protection capability that helps identify and remove viruses, spyware, and other malicious software, with configurable alerts when known malicious or unwanted software attempts to install itself or run on your system.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Antimalware for Azure Cloud Services and Virtual Machines is a real-time protection capability that helps identify and remove viruses, spyware, and other malicious software, with configurable alerts when known malicious or unwanted software attempts to install itself or run on your system.

trans-unit.source: Symantec Endpoint Protection 12.1.4 enables security and performance across physical and virtual systems.
trans-unit.target: Symantec Endpoint Protection 12.1.4 enables security and performance across physical and virtual systems.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>How to install and configure Symantec Endpoint Protection on an Azure VM</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>How to install and configure Symantec Endpoint Protection on an Azure VM</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Supports common operations management features and behavior.
trans-unit.target: Supports common operations management features and behavior.

trans-unit.source: See also the section on Deployment and Configuration Management, above.
trans-unit.target: See also the section on Deployment and Configuration Management, above.

trans-unit.source: You can use the AzureVMLogCollector extension on-demand to perfom one-time collection of logs from one or more Cloud Service VMs (from both web roles and worker roles) and transfer the collected files to an Azure storage account – all without remotely logging on to any of the VMs.
trans-unit.target: You can use the AzureVMLogCollector extension on-demand to perfom one-time collection of logs from one or more Cloud Service VMs (from both web roles and worker roles) and transfer the collected files to an Azure storage account – all without remotely logging on to any of the VMs.

trans-unit.source: Enables, disables, and configures Azure Diagnostics, and is also used by the AzureCATExtensionHandler to support SAP monitoring.
trans-unit.target: Enables, disables, and configures Azure Diagnostics, and is also used by the AzureCATExtensionHandler to support SAP monitoring.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine Monitoring with Azure Diagnostics Extension</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine Monitoring with Azure Diagnostics Extension</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Enables the Azure VM administrators to automate the VM OS updates with the customized configurations.
trans-unit.target: Enables the Azure VM administrators to automate the VM OS updates with the customized configurations.

trans-unit.source: You can use the OSPatching extension to configure OS updates for your virtual machines, including: Specify how often and when to install OS patches, Specify what patches to install, and Configure the reboot behavior after updates
trans-unit.target: You can use the OSPatching extension to configure OS updates for your virtual machines, including: Specify how often and when to install OS patches, Specify what patches to install, and Configure the reboot behavior after updates

trans-unit.source: See also the readme and source on Github at <link><linkText>OS Patching Extension</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: See also the readme and source on Github at <link><linkText>OS Patching Extension</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: These VM extensions are listed here for completeness, as they provide support for Visual Studio-related features and are not intended to be used directly.
trans-unit.target: These VM extensions are listed here for completeness, as they provide support for Visual Studio-related features and are not intended to be used directly.

trans-unit.source: Supports remote debugging from VS using the Azure SDK 2.4
trans-unit.target: Supports remote debugging from VS using the Azure SDK 2.4

trans-unit.source: Supports remote debugging from VS using the Azure SDK 2.4
trans-unit.target: Supports remote debugging from VS using the Azure SDK 2.4

trans-unit.source: Supports remote debugging from VS using the Azure SDK 2.4
trans-unit.target: Supports remote debugging from VS using the Azure SDK 2.4

trans-unit.source: Supports remote debugging from VS using the Azure SDK 2.3
trans-unit.target: Supports remote debugging from VS using the Azure SDK 2.3

trans-unit.source: Supports remote debugging from VS using the Azure SDK 2.3
trans-unit.target: Supports remote debugging from VS using the Azure SDK 2.3

trans-unit.source: Supports remote debugging from VS using the Azure SDK 2.3
trans-unit.target: Supports remote debugging from VS using the Azure SDK 2.3

trans-unit.source: Installs and configures IIS and Web Deploy on Windows Server.
trans-unit.target: Installs and configures IIS and Web Deploy on Windows Server.

trans-unit.source: Removing or disabling it is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Removing or disabling it is not supported.

trans-unit.source: These extensions provide support for other VM features that might be useful.
trans-unit.target: These extensions provide support for other VM features that might be useful.

trans-unit.source: Presents a consolidated picture of useful server information on the desktop when using RDP.
trans-unit.target: Presents a consolidated picture of useful server information on the desktop when using RDP.

trans-unit.source: Installs, configures, and maintains the following network device drivers on a size A8 or A9 virtual machine so that the VM can access the Azure remote direct-memory access (RDMA) network.
trans-unit.target: Installs, configures, and maintains the following network device drivers on a size A8 or A9 virtual machine so that the VM can access the Azure remote direct-memory access (RDMA) network.
